title: My VCR is buzzing loudly when I turn it on. Should I be worried? - Quora

response.answer_text: LOL, VCR…. You’ve got to be kidding. I’m surprised you’re still using one & that it’s still working but appears to be on its last legs of operation. Time to join today’s world & opt for an upgrade at least to a DVD player or use the internet for entertainment viewing. You may be one of the “Last of the Mohicans” using the old school VCR player. If any of your VCR tapes are worth preserving, it might be wise to convert them over to a DVD for future viewing or preservation.

My VCR is buzzing loudly when I turn it on. Should I be worried? If there’s a tape in the VCR, eject the tape, switch the machine off, then switch it back on - does it still buzz? If so, remove the cover of the VCR, listen to where the buzz is coming from and report findings for further troubleshooting.
